name: Death Star OG
description: Death Star OG is a potent cross between Sour Diesel, Sensi Star, and OG Kush.
descriptionPlain: Death Star OG is a potent cross between Sour Diesel, Sensi Star, and OG Kush.
aka: Deathstar OG, Death Star OG Kush, Deathstar OG Kush

highlightedReviews.text: While I have yet to review any particular strain until now, This particular flower prompted me to do so, as it is now my favorite of all I have tried.  I am partial to indicas, and this certainly fills the bill.  Enjoyable but strong, I used a vaporizer, which eliminated any possible harshness.  It comes on strong and stays with me well ast 2 hours, and the only problem I have is that it has been difficult to obtain.  Highly rated, surprisingly few dispensaries carry it, combining with it's popularity it is hard to find in stock.  Frustrating, as it is immensely helpful with my pain, appetite and sleep.  A must try, first timers might wish to moderate their dosage at first.

This strain is great for people with insomnia issues. I generally have a hard time sleeping even when using heavy indicas, but this strain does the job for me. It burns super slow and evenly so it makes for great joint weed.

articles.title: The 2014 San Francisco Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Over the weekend, cannabis enthusiasts flocked to the beautiful Bay Area of California to celebrate yet another High Times Cannabis Cup. Leafly was there (attendees, you scored a Leafly tank, right?) to witness the history unfold, and we return with news of your 2014 champions. Congratulations to all of the winners and to those who placed in their category!
 
 Best Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Cracker Jack – Santa Cruz Mountain Naturals
2nd Place: Silver Haze – MedMar Healing Center
3rd Place: Tangerine Haze – Heirloom Genetics
 
 Best Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Chem Scout – IC Collective
2nd Place: Paris OG – California Naturals
3rd Place: XXX OG Kush – Life Is Good Healing
 
 Best Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Thin Mint Cookies – Gold Coast Collection
2nd Place: Kush Company OG Kush – Wellness Earth Energy Dispensary – W.E.E.D Studio City
3rd Place: Deathstar – San Jose Patients Group
 
 Best Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Hell Raiser OG – TLC Collective / Gold Coast Extracts
2nd Place: XJ-13 Lemonhead – Alternative Herbal Health Services / Prime Extractions
3rd Place: J-1 – Nectar’s
 
Best Cannabis Edibles
1st Place: Artisanal Cannabis Macarons – Madame Munchie
2nd Place: Hazelnug & Grub – Organicares Collective
3rd Place: Jambo – Jambo Direct
 
Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Kottonmouth Kush x Strawberry Cough Ice Water Hash – Medibrothers
2nd Place: HGH Extractions Goji OG Solventless – Delta Health Center
3rd Place: BAMF Private Reserve Cookies – BAMF Extractions
 
Best High-CBD Cannabis Products
Flowers: Great White – Alpha Medic
Edibles: Medibrothers and MTG Medi-Chew High CBD – Medibrothers & MTG Seeds
Concentrates: Charlotte's Web – P.E.A.C.E. Plant Essentials And Cannabis Extracts
Photo credit: Thomas Hawk via Photopin CC

articles.title: The 2014 Denver Cannabis Cup Winning Flowers
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Another 4/20 has come and gone, and with it passes another High Times Cannabis Cup. This year’s Denver Cannabis Cup recognized six categories of top-shelf flowers with indicas, sativas, and hybrids divided into two subcategories that separated medical strains from other local legends. We hope you had a chance to visit the Leafly booth while you were at the Cup, but if you missed this weekend’s festival altogether, here’s a list of the 2014 champions.
Have you tried any of these winners? Does it deserve its place in the Hall of Fame? Don't forget to share your thoughts in a review!
Best Medical Hybrid


1st Place: Pure Power Plant from Good Meds Network

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Earthy, skunky aroma
Clear-headed, euphoric, and creative effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 10 weeks

2nd Place: Chem Crush from La Contes
3rd Place: Golden Goat from the Green Solution
 
Best U.S. Hybrid


1st Place: Cookies & Cream from Exotic Genetix

Hybrid cross between Starfighter and a GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) phenotype
Sweet flavor and aroma
Long-lasting relief for patients treating symptoms throughout the day

2nd Place: Colorado Chem from Cannables
3rd Place: A cross of Cinderella 99 and White from Natural Remedies
 
Best Medical Sativa


1st Place: Jilly Bean #1 from Standing Akimbo

Sativa cross between Orange Velvet and Space Queen
Tangy orange and mango aroma
Upbeat and happy effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks

2nd Place: Durban Poison from Denver Relief
3rd Place: Cherry Pie from The Clinic
 
Best U.S. Sativa


1st Place: Ghost Train Haze from Green Man Cannabis

Sativa cross between Ghost OG and Neville’s Wreck
Sour citrus and floral aroma
Good for pain, depression, and appetite loss
Low doses are conducive to concentration and creativity
Indoor flowering time of 65 to 80 days

2nd Place: Super Silver Haze from Life is Good Healing
3rd Place: Twista from The Green Solution
 
Best Medical Indica


1st Place: Larry OG from MMJ America

Indica cross between OG Kush and SFV OG
Earthy, lemon, and citrus aroma
Produces a potent yet functional body buzz

2nd Place: Raskal OG from Colorado Alternative Medicine
3rd Place: Denver Maple from Ballpark Holistic Dispensary
 
Best U.S. Indica


1st Place: South Central LA from Colorado Alternative Medicine & Root Seller Seeds
2nd Place: Grand Daddy Purple from Cannables
3rd Place: MK Ultra from The Green Solution
 
People's Choice Cup


1st Place: Presidential Kush from The Green Solution

Indica cross between OG Kush and Lemon Skunk
Skunky, citrus aroma
Balanced cerebral and body effects 
Good for treating insomnia or stress
Indoor flowering time of 8-9 weeks

2nd Place: Death Star from New Age Medical
3rd Place: Sour Diesel from Walking Raven Retail Marijuana Center
Image Source: Pokalhaufen via photopin cc
